Start

Layout

Grid

The grid is based on flexbox for convention and flexibility.

The grid is composed by row to create an horizontal block to hold the col. You can specify the width of each col with xs#, s#, m# and l#

col m3
col m3
col m3
col m3
<!-- CAN BE DEFINED AS, 
row top, row center-horizontal, row bottom, row stretch, row baseline, row left, row center, row right, row between
or row around -->
<div class="row center">
  <div class="col m3">col m3</div>
  <div class="col m3">col m3</div>
  <div class="col m3">col m3</div>
  <div class="col m3">col m3</div>
</div>

The row can be followed by these additional classes: top, center-horizontal, bottom, stretch, baseline, left, center, right, between, around and they will define how the columns are positioned on the page

col s4
col s4
col s4
col m6
<!-- CAN BE DEFINED AS, 
row top, row center-horizontal, row bottom, row stretch, row baseline, row left, row center, row right, row between
or row around -->
<div class="row center">
  <div class="col s4">col s4</div>
  <div class="col s4">col s4</div>
  <div class="col s4">col s4</div>
  <div class="col m6">col m6</div>
</div>

Typography

headings

This is a heading one - h1

This is a heading two - h2

This is a heading three - h3

This is a heading four - h4

This is a heading five - h5
This is a heading six - h6 
<h1>This is a heading one - h1 </h1>

<h2>This is a heading two - h2 </h2>

<h3>This is a heading three - h3 </h3>

<h4>This is a heading four - h4 </h4>

<h5>This is a heading five - h5 </h5>

<h6>This is a heading six - h6 </h6>

Text sizes

This is a paragraph with size one - size-1

This is a paragraph with size two - size-2

This is a paragraph with size three - size-3

This is a paragraph with size four - size-4

This is a paragraph with size five - size-5

This is a paragraph with size six - size-6 

<p class="size-1">This is a paragraph with size one - size-1 </p>

<p class="size-2">This is a paragraph with size two - size-2 </p>

<p class="size-3">This is a paragraph with size three - size-3 </p>

<p class="size-4">This is a paragraph with size four - size-4 </p>

<p class="size-5">This is a paragraph with size five - size-5 </p>

<p class="size-6">This is a paragraph with size six - size-6 </p>

Components

Buttons

Buttons are used to represent actions and you can use it with any html tag you want including <a>, <p> and div tags

primary info success warning danger 
<a href="#" class="button primary"> primary</a>

<a href="#" class="button info"> info</a>

<a href="#" class="button success"> success</a>

<a href="#" class="button warning"> warning</a>

<a href="#" class="button danger"> danger</a>

Outline colors

primary info success warning danger 
<a href="#" class="button primary outline"> primary</a>

<a href="#" class="button info outline"> info</a>

<a href="#" class="button success outline"> success</a>

<a href="#" class="button warning outline"> warning</a>

<a href="#" class="button danger outline"> danger</a>
